description: Waterproof, technical three-layer jacket for advanced mountain activities above the tree line. The hardwearing and breathable Eco-Shell fabric protects from bitter winds and precipitation and effortlessly follows body movements. This, together with its engineered cut and functional details, makes it a reliable wet-weather companion on tough ascents, on foot or skis, all year round.
name: Fjallraven Bergtagen Eco-Shell Jacket - Mens
